    • Method Detail

      • account

        @GetMapping(value="/account")
public java.lang.String account(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        This mapping is used for adding the personal info of the current logged in user to the frontend. It will show only last digits of the user's card number and none of his card CVV/CVC.

      • changeCard

        @PostMapping(value="/account/change-card")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView changeCard(@RequestParam(value="card_number",required=false)
                                                                                                               java.lang.String card_number,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="cardholder_name",required=false)
                                                                                                               java.lang.String cardholder_name,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="card_expiry_date",required=false)
                                                                                                               java.lang.String card_expiry_date,
                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="card_cvv",required=false)
                                                                                                               java.lang.String card_cvv,
                                                                                                               org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        This mapping is used for letting the user enter new card details. Can be accessed under "/account". Also contains relevant validations.
        Parameters:
        card_number - the card number
        cardholder_name - the cardholder name
        card_expiry_date - the card expiry date
        card_cvv - the card cvv/cvc

      • changePassword

        @PostMapping(value="/account/change-password")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView changePassword(@RequestParam(value="username",required=false)
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="currentPassword",required=false)
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String currentPassword,
                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="password",required=false)
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="passwordConfirm",required=false)
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String passwordConfirm,
                                                                                                                       org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        This mapping is used for letting the user choose a new password. Can be accessed under "/account". Also contains relevant validations.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the current logged in user
        currentPassword - the password of the current logged in user
        password - the new password of the current logged in user
        passwordConfirm - the confirmation of the new password of the current logged in user

      • changeUserinfo

        @PostMapping(value="/account/change-userinfo")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView changeUserinfo(@RequestParam(value="name",required=false)
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="birthday",required=false)
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String birthday,
                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="address_detail",required=false)
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String address_detail,
                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="city",required=false)
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String city,
                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="country",required=false)
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String country,
                                                                                                                       org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        This mapping is used for letting the user edit his account info. Can be accessed under "/account". The username cannot be changed! Also contains relevant validations.
